inclusion.criterion: Able to read and speak English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History fits with International Diabetic Foot Risk Classification System category 2 or 3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Callus and/or Deformity and/or One areas of loss of sensation as determined by assessment with Semmes Weinstein Monofilament
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of hyperlipidemia in his mother and MI in his father, but no underlying disease such as DM. He smokes 15 cigarettes per day and drinks a beer per day.
